title: Turkey Unplugged
inclusions_evidence: Accommodation: 9 nights 4 star and special class hotels
Guided sightseeing - Istanbul, Gallipoli, Troy, Ruins of Ephesus and Pergamum, Pamukkale, Hierapolis and Cappadocia
Airport arrival transfer on day 1 of tour and departure transfer at set times

other.notes: Specific costs for meals, sightseeing, and transfers are not provided.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive tour package with accommodations and meals included, but lacks specific DIY pricing for flights and hotels, making it difficult to assess true savings.
additional_notes: The deal does not include flights, which could significantly affect overall cost.
